aircraft.value: Nighthawk Stealth - AC-5088-185 at Sector East Station

defect_observed.value: Battery thermal runaway indication. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

root_cause.value: Manufacturing defect in material composition leading to premature failure

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Power Distribution component. Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.

corrective_action.value: Implement enhanced testing protocol before component installation

preventive_action.value: Reduce inspection interval for affected component type

remarks_investigation.value: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 02/07/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality control procedures verified. Recommend periodic surveillance of manufacturing facility. Date: 03/07/2024 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational usage reviewed. Component operated within prescribed limits. Concur with investigation outcome. Date: 05/07/2024 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Regulatory quality requirements verified. Proposed actions meet airworthiness standards. Recommend approval. Date: 08/07/2024 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design aspects reviewed from certification authority perspective. Investigation is thorough and conclusions are sound. Date: 07/07/2024 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma
